content: That's really helpful, thank you! I'll definitely consider getting a humidifier, but I'll make sure to do my research and consult with my vet first. By the way, I was thinking of taking Max to the vet soon for a check-up. I took him about a month ago for his vaccinations and check-up, and the vet recommended that I start giving him a joint supplement to help with his arthritis. Have you got any advice on how to administer the supplement?
